explains: n. 信徒，使徒；最初的传道者

sentences.en: Her mother was a dedicated apostle of healthy eating.
sentences.cn: 她妈妈是健康饮食的忠实信徒。

sentences.en: Because Paul was Marcion's fave, fave apostle.
sentences.cn: 因为保罗是马吉安最喜欢的使徒。

sentences.en: Thecla becomes her own Apostle spreading the message.
sentences.cn: 特格拉成为自己的使徒，传播讯息。
